title: Is it obligatory to pray Friday Prayer in the Masjid? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: as he says i live in germany and there is only one message in our town which is very far from my house is it obligatory for me to pray friday prayer there or can i pray brohur at home no you must pray friday prayer even if this is the only masjid in town and you have to travel a distance to reach it or walk a long distance to reach it because this is mandatory is mandatory and you must respond to the adhan you
